ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds whole rainbow trout, gutted and cleaned, heads and tails still on
2 sprigs fresh cilantro, or more to taste
2 sprigs fresh parsley, or more to taste
2 sprigs fresh dill, or more to taste

cookingTips: Use coarse sea salt mixed with egg whites to create a pliable crust that seals in moisture
Crack open the salt crust at the table for dramatic presentation and to keep fish steaming
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Salt baking is a classic French technique that creates an impermeable seal. What moisture-trapping benefit does this method provide?
